column5: The programme aims at learning the students how we can achieve a sustainable change of cities. The programme will cover issues of engineering such as waste, energy, water resources and transport, as well as political science, green growth and different forms of impact assessment.LEARN ABOUTPlanning and planning rolesStrategic planningSustainable transitionDo you want to work with the sustainable transition of today’s cities? Do you want to influence and plan how we deal with climate change and environmental problems in our cities? Do you want to learn how urban infrastructures and systems can be transitioned to being sustainable? Then you should study Sustainable Cities at Aalborg University in Copenhagen.
